title: Ep 29. The Crystal Kingdom - Chapter One
description: A new adventure begins! Join our heroes as they host a relatively successful office holiday party, and mourn as that party gets totally sidelined by a potential apocalypse. Magnus puts his carpentry to good use. Taako perfects his macaroon recipe. Merle does some re-gifting.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
